fussy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: very concerned about small, usually unimportant details, and difficult to please
fussy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A lot of small children are fussy eaters  (=they dislike many types of food).
‘Do you want to go out or just rent a movie?’ ‘I’m not fussy’ (=I don’t mind).
Sue was fussy about her looks.
fussy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: fussy clothes, objects, buildings etc are very detailed and decorated – used to show disapproval
fussy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The furniture looked comfortable, nothing fussy or too elaborate.
fussy.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: with small, exact, and careful actions, sometimes showing nervousness
fussy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: She patted her hair with small fussy movements.
